fulltext:
EDUCATION 
HANOI UNIVERSITY 
OCT 2013 - MAY 2017 
Major: Management and tourism Department 
The major was totally taught in English 
      WORK EXPERIENCE 
DMS E-COMMERCIAL COMPANY 
NOV 2017 - NOW 
Ideal Staff and Customer Support 
- Create ideals to printing on t shirt, mugs,pilows for Foreigners in US, UK market 
- Market research 
- Make reports of sales every day. 
- Task related to customer support 
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Have base knowledge about E commercial 
- Be assessed positively by the leader: active, extremely well adaptable, hard working 
- Well Observe, self-learning and catch customers’ taste well. 
- Improve Communication Skill. 
THE HONEST WOLF - HIGH QUALITY FOOD STORE CHAIN 
FEB 2017 - NOV 2017 
Customer service 
- Handle all task related to customers 
- Creat package products and combo to increase revenue..  
- Make reports of sales every day. 
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Office skills, team work 
- Observe, learn and catch customers’ insight. 
- Improve communication Communication Skill. 
DAFUSA GROUP 
6- 2015 - 9-2015 
SEO/copy writing 
Main responsibilities: 
- Write content on website follow SEO standar 
ENGLISH TUTOR 
JUNE 2014 - DEC 1014 
ENGLISH TUTOR :grade 7,8,9 
Main responsibilities: 
- Prepare homework and lession for students 
- Assist to control student's study 
- Be student' friend 
Recognition and Gains: 
- One student got IOE reward; Online English Compettion  
- Students got higher mark at shool 
NGUYỄN THỊ THU HẠNH 
Category & QC Specialist 
04/08/1995 
Female 
Đại Từ, Hoàng Mai, Vietnam 
OBJECTIVE 
Take advantages of English skills, 
experience and understanding of 
customer service to work in 
International environment and 
Widen knowledge 
SKILLS 
Microsoft Office 
Logical thinking and creative 
English 
Team work 
Time management 
CHARACTERISTIC: 
Energetic and sociable 
Well organized person 
Be responsible 
Hard working 
      ACTIVITIES 
VOLUNTEER 
FEB 2015 
Volunteer at Vietnam Museum of Ethnology 
- Organize new year events, 
- Introduce and guide childrens to play some game in Children's room
